PackageOracle.name: DA_LINEUP
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_LINEUP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.58.792090000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,lineup_desc IN VARCHAR2
,psc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,lineup_desc IN VARCHAR2
,psc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,lineup_desc IN VARCHAR2
,psc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_lineup;

body.name: DA_LINEUP
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_LINEUP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.58.803488000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,lineup_desc IN VARCHAR2
,psc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_lineup.add(fx), parms=' || headend_id || '|' || lineup_desc || '|' || psc_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_lineup a
(
a.lineup_id
,a.headend_id
,a.lineup_desc
,a.psc_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_lineup_id.NEXTVAL
,add.headend_id
,add.lineup_desc
,add.psc_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.lineup_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_lineup.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,lineup_desc IN VARCHAR2
,psc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_lineup.add, parms=' || headend_id || '|' || lineup_desc || '|' || psc_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_lineup a
(
a.lineup_id
,a.headend_id
,a.lineup_desc
,a.psc_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_lineup_id.NEXTVAL
,add.headend_id
,add.lineup_desc
,add.psc_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_lineup.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,lineup_desc IN VARCHAR2
,psc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_lineup.add, parms=' || lineup_id || '|' || headend_id || '|' || lineup_desc || '|' || psc_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_lineup a
(
a.lineup_id
,a.headend_id
,a.lineup_desc
,a.psc_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.lineup_id
,add.headend_id
,add.lineup_desc
,add.psc_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_lineup.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,lineup_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_lineup.del, parms=' || lineup_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_lineup a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.lineup_id = del.lineup_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_lineup.del');

END del;

END da_lineup;
